model: Complete C3 Canister (Alize / Marin / Cat & Dog)
seo_keywords: Miele C3 power head not spinning

problems.title: Airflow Indicator is Orange/Red
problems.description: The light on the canister turns orange, indicating reduced suction.
possible_causes: Clog in the hose or wand
solution_steps: Replace the GN HyClean bag immediately. Never empty and reuse.
Check the HEPA filter status strip. If red, replace it.
Drop a coin down the wand to check for blockages.

problems.title: Power Brush Not Spinning
problems.description: The carpet head (SEB 228/236) lights up but the brush doesn't turn.
solution_steps: Turn off and press the reset button on the power head.
Cut away hair wrapped around the roller.
